pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation of the probability of ruin within a finite time horizon // In the CramrLundberg risk process perturbed by a Wiener process, this packages provides approximations to the probability of ruin within a finite time horizon. Currently, there are three methods implemented: The first one uses saddlepoint approximation (two variants are provided), the second one uses importance sampling and the third one is based on the simulation of a dual process. This last method is not very accurate and only given here for completeness.
